## Description
A clear and concise description of the documentation issue or improvement needed.

## Location
Where is the documentation located or where should it be added?
- File/Page: [e.g. README.md, API docs, Wiki]
- Section: [e.g. Installation, Configuration]

## Current State
Describe what the current documentation says (if it exists) or what's missing.

## Expected Outcome
What should the documentation clearly explain or how should it be improved?

## Proposed Changes
Describe what changes or additions would improve the documentation.
